COMMENT_TX: ej,herzw101,M,clara901,Interference call Royals Manager Whitey Herzog ejected by 2B umpire Al Clark after Clark called Hal McRae for interference at 2B
$Darrell Porter charged mound
36 minute rain delay before start of game
33 minute rain delay at 8:45pm
Steve Stone left with stiffness in shoulder
$Frank White out on appeal; did not retouch 2B on way back to 1B
Bobby Grich safe on error at 2B then advanced to 3B
$Dave Nelson,who moved to 3B after the catch, started home and was caught in a rundown to end the game

ej,herzw101,M,dimul901,Position of runners aft fan interference Royals Manager Whitey Herzog ejected by HP umpire Lou DiMuro arguing that Darrell Porter would have scored from 1B without the fan interference
ej,joner002,P,phild901,Call at 1B Ruppert Jones ejected by HP umpire Dave Phillips
$Paul Splittorff hit by Craig Reynolds liner just below right knee in 5th
ej,mcmuk101,P,brinj901,Bench jockeying Ken McMullen ejected by HP umpire Joe Brinkman
ej,winkb801,M,pales901,Catch/trap call Athletics Manager Bobby Winkles ejected by 2B umpire Steve Palermo arguing that Amos Otis' fly was caught
John Mayberry hurt right foot
ej,fossr101,P,mckej901,Called third strike Ray Fosse ejected by HP umpire Jim McKean
$Darrell Porter intentionally ran through pitcher Bart Johnson who covered the bag on the putout; the two had words but nothing happened beyond that
ej,johnb105,P,phild901,Fighting with Darrell Porter ej,portd001,P,phild901,Fighting with Lamar Johnson Darrell Porter and Bart Johnson clash again; both are ejected by HP umpire Dave Phillips
Debut game for Randy Wiles
Mark Littell left with stiff back
$high hopper to George Scott who waited for Bill Campbell to arrive
Tom Poquette sprained left ankle
Tom McMullen left with injured hand
Paul Splittorff injured
Debut game for Tom McMillan
Debut game for Clint Hurdle
Debut game for Byron McLaughlin
